question: TipTeapi, which was making news recently, is an application related to which field?
explanation:
A team of three computer engineers from Assam have successfully developed a video playing and sharing application named ‘TipTeapi’.
It is said to be the rival of the famous Chinese application TikTok. It is said to be a secure application with privacy protection. At present, the application is available for users in India and a few other countries.
